#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

name.description: Instance/role name to be assigned to service.

trX.description:
Transform for X axis. Values of 1, 2, 3 will return the corresponding raw axis (indexed from 1).
Values -1, -2, -3 will do likewise but will negate the axis.

trY.description:
Transform for Y axis. Values of 1, 2, 3 will return the corresponding raw axis (indexed from 1).
Values -1, -2, -3 will do likewise but will negate the axis.

trZ.description:
Transform for Z axis. Values of 1, 2, 3 will return the corresponding raw axis (indexed from 1).
Values -1, -2, -3 will do likewise but will negate the axis.

variant.description: Service variant (see service definition for possible values).

#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

activeHigh.description:
Button is normally active-low and pulled high.
This makes it active-high and pulled low.

name.description: Instance/role name to be assigned to service.

pinBacklight.description: This pin is set high when the button is pressed.

variant.description: Service variant (see service definition for possible values).

#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

activeLow.description:
When set, the `pin` will be set to `1` when no sound is playing
(because power flows through speaker when `pin` is set to `0`).
When unset, the `pin` will be set to `0` when no sound is playing.

name.description: Instance/role name to be assigned to service.

variant.description: Service variant (see service definition for possible values).

#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

name.description: Instance/role name to be assigned to service.

variant.description: Service variant (see service definition for possible values).

#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

name.description: Instance/role name to be assigned to service.

variant.description: Service variant (see service definition for possible values).

#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

name.description: Instance/role name to be assigned to service.

variant.description: Service variant (see service definition for possible values).

#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

name.description: Instance/role name to be assigned to service.

variant.description: Service variant (see service definition for possible values).

#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

kHz.description: How fast to run the I2C, typically either 100 or 400.

#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored
All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

mult.description: Multiplier to compensate for different LED strengths.

#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

isMono.description:
Defaults to `true` if `pin` is set and `type` is 0.
Otherwise `false`.

pin.description: If a single mono LED, or programmable RGB LED.

type.description:
0 - use `pin` or `rgb` as regular pins
1 - use `pin` as WS2812B (supported only on some boards)
2 - use `pin` as APA102 DATA, and `pinCLK` as CLOCK
3 - use `pin` as SK9822 DATA, and `pinCLK` as CLOCK
Other options (in range 100+) are also possible on some boards.

#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

activeLow.description: When set, the relay is considered 'active' when `pin` is low.

dimmable.description: When set, the pin will be operated with PWM at a few kHz.

name.description: Instance/role name to be assigned to service.

variant.description: Service variant (see service definition for possible values).

#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

name.description: Instance/role name to be assigned to service.

pinHigh.description: Pin to pull high before analog read and release afterwards.

pinLow.description: Pin to pull low before analog read and release afterwards.

samplingDelay.description: How many milliseconds to wait after setting `pinLow`/`pinHigh` before sampling.

samplingItv.description: Interval in milliseconds between samplings of the sensor.

streamingItv.description: Default interval in milliseconds between streaming samples.

variant.description: Service variant (see service definition for possible values).

#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored
All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

activeLow.description: When set, the sensor is considered 'active' when `pin` is low.

name.description: Instance/role name to be assigned to service.

variant.description: Service variant (see service definition for possible values).

PinLabels.description:
Typical pin labels, others are allowed.
Pin labels starting with '@' are hidden to the user.

#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

name.description: Instance/role name to be assigned to service.

pinHigh.description: Pin to pull high before analog read and release afterwards.

pinLow.description: Pin to pull low before analog read and release afterwards.

samplingDelay.description: How many milliseconds to wait after setting `pinLow`/`pinHigh` before sampling.

samplingItv.description: Interval in milliseconds between samplings of the sensor.

streamingItv.description: Default interval in milliseconds between streaming samples.

variant.description: Service variant (see service definition for possible values).

#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

faultIgnoreMs.description: How long (in milliseconds) to ignore the `pinFault` after enabling.

mode.description:
Operation mode of pinEn
0 - `pinEn` is active high
1 - `pinEn` is active low
2 - transistor-on-EN setup, where flt and en are connected at limiter
3 - EN should be pulsed at 50Hz (10ms on, 10ms off) to enable the limiter

name.description: Instance/role name to be assigned to service.

pinPulse.description: Active-low pin for pulsing battery banks.

pinUsbDetect.description: Pin that is high when we are connected to USB or similar power source.

variant.description: Service variant (see service definition for possible values).

#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

name.description: Instance/role name to be assigned to service.

pinHigh.description: Pin to pull high before analog read and release afterwards.

pinLow.description: Pin to pull low before analog read and release afterwards.

samplingDelay.description: How many milliseconds to wait after setting `pinLow`/`pinHigh` before sampling.

samplingItv.description: Interval in milliseconds between samplings of the sensor.

streamingItv.description: Default interval in milliseconds between streaming samples.

variant.description: Service variant (see service definition for possible values).

#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

activeLow.description: When set, the relay is considered 'active' when `pin` is low.

initalActive.description: Whether to activate the relay upon boot.

name.description: Instance/role name to be assigned to service.

pinFeedback.description: Active-high pin that indicates the actual state of the relay.

pinLed.description: This pin will be driven when relay is active.

variant.description: Service variant (see service definition for possible values).

#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

clicksPerTurn.description: How many clicks for full 360 turn.

name.description: Instance/role name to be assigned to service.

variant.description: Service variant (see service definition for possible values).

#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

fixed.description: When set, the min/maxAngle/Pulse can't be changed by the user.

maxAngle.description:
Maximum angle supported by the servo in degrees.
Always minAngle < maxAngle

maxPulse.description:
Pulse value to use to reach maxAngle in us.
Typically minPulse > maxPulse

minAngle.description:
Minimum angle supported by the servo in degrees.
Always minAngle < maxAngle

minPulse.description:
Pulse value to use to reach minAngle in us.
Typically minPulse > maxPulse

name.description: Instance/role name to be assigned to service.

powerPin.description: The pin to set low when servo is used. Floating otherwise.

variant.description: Service variant (see service definition for possible values).

#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

pinHigh.description: Pin to pull high before analog read and release afterwards.

pinLow.description: Pin to pull low before analog read and release afterwards.

samplingDelay.description: How many milliseconds to wait after setting `pinLow`/`pinHigh` before sampling.

samplingItv.description: Interval in milliseconds between samplings of the sensor.

streamingItv.description: Default interval in milliseconds between streaming samples.

name.description: Instance/role name to be assigned to service.

pinHigh.description: Pin to pull high before analog read and release afterwards.

pinLow.description: Pin to pull low before analog read and release afterwards.

samplingDelay.description: How many milliseconds to wait after setting `pinLow`/`pinHigh` before sampling.

#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

$services.description: Services to expose via `startXYZ()` API. Each starts with { "service": "..." }

@name.description: Name of the program, derived from package.json. Exposed as `program_name` register.

@version.description: Version number of the program, derived from package.json and git. Exposed as `program_version` register.

archId.description:
Architecture for the board.
This is auto-populated from arch.json file.

devNetwork.description:
Don't start internal cloud adapter service (including the WiFi adapter) and instead use one running
on the computer connected via USB.

productId.description: Identifier for a particular firmware running on a particular device, typically given as a hex number starting with 0x3.

scanI2C.description: Enable legacy auto-scan for I2C devices.

services.description:
Services to mount. Each starts with { "service": "..." }
This should not be present in .board.json files.
